IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE WEST VIRGINIA SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA MAKES GREAT MUSIC TO ENRICH AND INSPIRE EVERYONE IN OUR REGION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WEST VIRGINIA SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA MAKES GREAT MUSIC TO ENRICH AND INSPIRE EVERYONE IN OUR REGION.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE SYMPHONIC CONCERTS THROUGHOUT WEST VIRGINIA AT A MINIMAL COST TO ATTENDEES, REACH AUDIENCES THAT OTHERWISE WOULD NOT HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO HEAR LIVE CLASSICAL MUSIC. ALL REVENUES SUPPORT PERFORMANCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS WILL BE HELD & INVESTED BY THE WEST VIRGINIA SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA FOUNDATION, INC. DISTRIBUTIONS WILL BE MADE TO THE WEST VIRGINIA SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA, INC. TO HELP FUND ITS OPERATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 WILL BE E-MAILED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE & THEY WILL BE GIVEN A PERIOD OF TIME TO REVIEW THE DOCUMENT & SUBMIT COMMENTS AND QUESTIONS TO MANAGEMENT. ALL COMMENTS AND QUESTIONS WILL BE ADDRESSED BEFORE SUBMITTING THE RETURN TO THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS AN INFORMAL PROCESS OF REVIEWING BOARD MEMBERS RELATIONSHIPS WITH OTHER ORGANIZATIONS IN THE COMMUNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ACCEPTS RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT.
